name: ComCon
description:
ComCon

ComCon is a top-down shoot 'em up where you grow your community by convincing people to leave enemy groups and pick them up. With your charisma, the community of hugs can surely become the greatest! Go on! Defeat the wicked communities of cookies, merch, and fanfiction by PERSUASION!!

Controls

Walk - WASD or Arrow Keys.

Shoot - Left Mouse Button.

Credits

Code - Mohammed Diab

Art - MadameEtrange
